title: FM, Turkish envoy discuss bilateral ties
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 1 (APP):Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani Friday here held a meeting with ambassador of Turkiye Dr. Mehmet Pa√ßaci and discussed matters of mutual interest.
They reviewed Pakistan-Turkiye ties and reaffirmed commitment to further strengthen cooperation in all areas of mutual interest.
They expressed satisfaction at convergence of views on all major regional and global issues.
